tool.name: CRAFT
tool.description: calculate, annotate and visualise credible SNP sets
tool.command:
## Run CRAFT craft.sh $distance_type $distance -a $number_of_cases -u $number_of_controls -t $epigenomes.epigenomes_type #if str( $epigenomes.epigenomes_type ) == "group" -e "$epigenomes.epigenomes_groups" #else -e "$epigenomes.epigenomes_list" #end if -o output "$index_snps_list" "$gwas_summary_stats" &&
## Collect outputs for define regions cp "output/regions/*_boundaries_*.txt" "$output_regions" &&
## Collect outputs for credible SNPs mv output/credible_snps/credible_snp_list_0.99.txt "$output_snp_list" && mv output/credible_snps/credible_snps_0.99.bed "$output_bed" && mv output/credible_snps/credible_snps_0.99.txt "$output_txt" && mv output/credible_snps/summary_table_0.99.txt "$output_summary_table" &&
## Collect outputs for annotation mv output/annotation/annotation.csv "$output_csv" && mv output/annotation/annotation.vcf "$output_vcf" && mv output/annotation/annotation.vcf_summary.html "$output_html"
## Outputs for visualisation collected via dataset discovery

param.name: name
param.label: Name for labelling output directory and files

param.name: distance_type
param.label: Specify how distance should be defined

param.name: distance
param.label: Size of region
param.help: Units are selected above; typical values for cM are 0.1 or 0.2 (DISTANCE)

param.name: number_of_cases
param.label: Number of cases in GWAS summary statistics

param.name: number_of_controls
param.label: Number of controls in GWAS summary statistics

param.name: epigenomes_groups
param.label: Roadmap epigenomics groups to annotate against

param.name: epigenomes_list
param.label: Roadmap epigenomics datasets to annotate against

tool.help:
.. class:: infomark
**What it does**
CRAFT (Credible Refinement and Annotation of Functional Targets) is a pipeline for the calculation, annotation and visualisation of credible SNP sets
.. class:: infomark
**Usage**
See the GitHub site for information on usage:
https://github.com/johnbowes/CRAFT-GP
